title: Security Monitoring - Estimated Usage
description:
## Security Monitoring

This dashboard aims to give you insights into the Datadog Security Monitoring estimated usage metrics.

See the [Security Monitoring documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/security_platform/security_monitoring/) to learn more about the product.

See the [Security Monitoring pricing page](https://www.datadoghq.com/pricing/?product=security-monitoring#security-monitoring) to learn more about the different plans available.

definition.title: Analyzed logs vs Indexed logs vs Ingested logs #
Contribution % to the amount of bytes analyzed per source
Contribution % to the amount of bytes analyzed per source

definition.content:
This scatter plot displays the amount of analyzed logs ingested vs the combined size of those analyzed logs in bytes for each one of your source.

The more a source is in the upper right corner the more it might impact your security costs as it means it's ingesting lots of logs and the combined size of all those logs is "very big"
